fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 82.65 points or 0.46% to settle at 18,147.65. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, zoomed 8.67% to 11.90. Reliance Industries (RIL), Kotak Mahindra Bank and Infosys were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The May 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 25 May 2023.
